website_summaries.verdict: It’s common knowledge that hedgehogs enjoy snacking on high-energy, protein, and nutrient-rich mealworms, and this bag of quality dehydrated mealworms makes for a truly motivating treat.
cons: It would be appreciated if Zilla sold their mealworms in larger bag sizes

customer_reviews.title: Makes better bird food
customer_reviews.text: My Gecko did not like these at all even when soften up in some water, spread them out on the driveway and the birds went nuts for them. Glad they didn't go to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Tennisshoes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Stinks to high heaven and my leopard geckos will not touch it. They much prefer live food to this. Tried getting this as a backup for when I don’t have live feeders on hand but my geckos simply won’t touch it.
customer_reviews.author: porte8a2

customer_reviews.title: My reptiles love these mealworms!
customer_reviews.text: My bearded dragon, leopard geckos, and red eared slider all love these mealworms. It's a nice crunchy treat for them every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelaKing95

customer_reviews.title: Bearded dragon treat
customer_reviews.text: If I let him Norbert would eat this whole bag. This is not a staple diet adequate for daily feeding. I usually give him a few as a treat on cleaning day or when the kids have been handling him a lot on weekends. I mix them in with his veggies and he digs them out and crunches away on them.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Willis

customer_reviews.title: Lizards will not eat them for some reason
customer_reviews.text: Over all these freeze dried meal worms are exactly what they say they are. The issue I have is that all three of my lizards refuse to eat them regardless of how I present them. I dont want to say they are bad product but on the other hand all I can use these for now is compost. It's not like it's just oh one type of lizard wont eat them it's both of my leopard geckos and my bearded dragon that refuse them.
customer_reviews.author: L. John Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Good to keep on hand
customer_reviews.text: These have been life savers on multiple occasions when I didn’t have time to run to the local pet store to pick up live food. I use this as a substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great for feeding reptiles between live feedings
customer_reviews.text: Great for feeding our leopard geckos in between live feedings. We have 2 leopard geckos and these make it convenient to cut down the trips to get crickets and worms every week.
customer_reviews.author: B. Burn

customer_reviews.title: Mealworm Salad Recipe
customer_reviews.text: We often make a salad of mustard greens and little strawberry chunks. Then, we top it with the MEALWORMS like bacon bits and our bearded dragon goes wild. She is a happy, healthy, and muscular girl on the mealworms. It's funny to hear her crunch on them. There seems to be shortage at this time and we need really them. Our beardie loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: As you know the food is freeze dried. However I cant see how this provides any nutritional value as food being that most af the worms are hollow and just the outer shell of them. Best just buying the live versions of these things if you care about your pet.
customer_reviews.author: ALISSA MACDONALD

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: when jet was little, he was picky and wanted things that moved. but now that he is older, he eats more things. when we feed him these we usually feed him a few live ones with them so when he looks down at his food, he sees movement.
customer_reviews.author: K. Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My leopard gecko loves these! Convenient resealable packaging; quick and easy to give as snacks and to add some variety to my gecko's diet.
customer_reviews.author: Marley G.

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: In my case, "MY" Leopard Geckos dont eat them. This doesn't mean that its a bad product or low quality. The bag and the dried worms look of good quality. I think it just my geckos.
customer_reviews.author: SOFTEXAS

customer_reviews.title: Lizard Approved
customer_reviews.text: My bearded dragon loves these in her salad that I make her daily. Adds some good protein to her diet and is easy for her to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Herrle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dietary supplement and treat for my pet Rat
customer_reviews.text: Rats are Omnivorous. Most commercial rat feed is plant based. I use these dried mealworms to add a clean and convenient source of animal protein to her diet. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Jody S.

customer_reviews.title: Ants love them nothing else does
customer_reviews.text: Lizards won’t eat them, birds won’t touch them. They are good fit one thing...attracting ants.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wet em
customer_reviews.text: My little fence lizard loves these. I took some advice from someone in the reviews and wet them before putting them into his space and after about a week or two he came around. I use these more as treats not his actual meals.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Money down the drain
customer_reviews.text: The geckos will not touch them. And the company has a no return policy. Dont buy, waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Julia D.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: My lizard won’t even go near them. After I shook the bad you could see bugs in the bag Alive
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great suppliment for squirrels.
customer_reviews.text: My squirrel loves these. Great protein source. Much better price than I found locally. And I only have one squirrel so I appreciate the quantity. I dont need bulk quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product but to mush money to pay for it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but is to expensive to mush money for the small bag guys
customer_reviews.author: Leopoldo R.

customer_reviews.title: tasty treat
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a treat and a food additive for my hamster, it add a good bit of protein and hamster seem to love it
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great Substitution for Live
customer_reviews.text: My beardie loves these dried mealworms, not all beardies do. They are easy to keep than live ones. You cannot beat the price on Amazon either. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Diane M. Ulitsch

customer_reviews.title: Snacks!
customer_reviews.text: Bearded Dragon loves these! I mix them with a few live ones and but on top of his salad.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: My leopard geckos love them they are easy to store as well the bag is big!
customer_reviews.author: R&A

customer_reviews.title: Mealworms are great for turtles.
customer_reviews.text: Are you these mealworms to feed my red eared sliders. They all absolutely love them including the very smallest of the babies.
customer_reviews.author: Athens Zylia Spark

customer_reviews.title: Hedgehog approves
customer_reviews.text: These are just freeze dried stinky bugs 🤷🏻‍♀️ But my hedgehog loves to snack on them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for any bearded dragon owner who doesn’t want to house live insects. My dragon rarely gets live roaches or crickets and it only took him a second to start munching on these. These are great if your reptile is not used to live.
customer_reviews.author: Kassi

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my hamsters before they passed away. They really liked it. Haven't tried it on my leopard geckos though, i'm guessing that they wouldn't eat them bc they're already dead. it comes with a LOT. I kinda fear that they could go bad bc i dot use them much but idk.
customer_reviews.author: Grace T.

customer_reviews.title: Meal work imposters.
customer_reviews.text: My reptiles are used to real mealworms they were like nope. All empty on the inside so more like mealworm shells, but my outdoor birds loved them.
customer_reviews.author: jessica misora

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my product!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my meal worms exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Masse

customer_reviews.title: My beardie will eat it
customer_reviews.text: My beardie is very picky, I use this for a snack
customer_reviews.author: a.roberts

customer_reviews.title: Beardie won't touch them
customer_reviews.text: My beardie wont touch them so they are of no value to me. They kinda stink
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Hollow mealworms
customer_reviews.text: These mealworms are hollow with nothing inside. I’m going back to Fluker’s brand products.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Birds love them lizards love them best snack for them
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Packed full of mealworms. Last a while for me. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Hmm
customer_reviews.text: My lizard has not taken to them yet but will keep up and update if so..
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Quantity is wow!
customer_reviews.text: My slider and painted turtles love this stuff. The bag was alot bigger than I assumed so I’m stocked for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Valent

customer_reviews.title: Good value for price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Bearded dragon likes them added for snacks.
customer_reviews.author: dcsj

customer_reviews.title: Spoiling my turtles!
customer_reviews.text: My turtles love these! I alternate between these, shrimps and crickets... they're spoiled lol
customer_reviews.author: Emalee Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: They were delicious. That's what I'm assuming anyways. My bearded dragon happily ate them with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Mays

customer_reviews.title: One satisfied gecko
customer_reviews.text: My gecko loves this. He doesn’t like hunting crickets anymore. So this was a great switch for him.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I recommend you buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, you definitely get a huge amount for the price. My Russian tortoises love it mixed with some fruits and veggies!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: This good for geckos
customer_reviews.text: My gecko love these I will definitely buy again. Also it wasn’t delivered to my house but to my neighbor house so my neighbor had to give to me lol
customer_reviews.author: Eowyn Robles

customer_reviews.title: Gecko approved
customer_reviews.text: The geckos love this, the like this a lot, so I’m a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good snack!
customer_reviews.text: My leo likes these. I keep them in his tank at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Mix these in with my beardies greens they munch on them with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My lizards love these and theyre not hard very crunchy..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best value we’ve found!
customer_reviews.text: Second bag arrived a little more smushed. But the animals do not care. Best value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Had some beetles and cocoons? But leopard gecko ate them like a boss!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well. But had some cocoons and beetles, doesn't matter because my leo ate them without a problem! Thanks Zella!
customer_reviews.author: GalaxyStar

customer_reviews.title: My leopard gecko wouldn't eat them.
customer_reviews.text: It said in the description that it was for leopard gecko specifically, thats why i purchased them but my leopard gecko wouldn't eat them. I have tried numerous times she won't touch them.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My critter loves them! And it’s nice I can seal the bag up!!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S. McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper then fancy pet stores. My bearded dragon loves these
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: My leopard gecko only ever ate one of these he didn’t like them too much so it kind of was a waste of my own money but that’s my fault
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Better quality and more affordable
customer_reviews.text: Longer less broken pieces; perfect treats treats for my hamster!
customer_reviews.author: Rebeccah R Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: My bearded dragon and gecko do not like these. However the crickets love them
customer_reviews.text: My bearded dragon and gecko do not like these. However the crickets love them. Any crickets lucky enough to not get eaten will nibble on these instead of your pet.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, but a lot of the worms were crushed and not whole, probably due to shipping
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Way cheaper than in the store definitely will be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Coy

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: My bearded drahon is a picky eater. He love these worms! He gets excited when he sees the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me
customer_reviews.text: Just didn't work for me there is nothing wrong with the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Blue

customer_reviews.title: These mealworms work great for our beardie although they are a little bigger ...
customer_reviews.text: These mealworms work great for our beardie although they are a little bigger than I thought they were going to be. Our beardie is still a juvenile, but he is still able to eat them just fine.
customer_reviews.author: JBrownie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We hand feed these to our bearded dragon and he loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: danielle cheers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our gecko loves these, what else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: m4

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Zilla loves his worms and he is a finicky bearded dragon!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Muir

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: My leopard gecko immediately started eating them. I think live insects are better but these can suffice as a snack and you get a ton of them for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ess

customer_reviews.title: My turtle won’t touch these.
customer_reviews.text: My painted turtle loves mealworms, so I ordered this larger bag. He won’t touch them. I’ve tried for the past month but he will not eat these. Wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Peiffer

customer_reviews.title: but you're slither pal might enjoy the dried mealies more than mine did
customer_reviews.text: my gecko won't eat these:( my advise it to go ahead and buy live insects, my gecko loves them, but you're slither pal might enjoy the dried mealies more than mine did!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My bearded dragon and water turtles love them. Perfect snack for them.
customer_reviews.author: Travis L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great product for the price. A lot cheaper than going to a pet store.
customer_reviews.author: snaps55b

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about the taste, but they look delicious
customer_reviews.text: My very picky leopard gecko won't eat them so I gave them to a friend who has birds, and they love them! So glad they didn't go to waste since they look delicious as far as dried meal worms go.... Nice and crunchy and not broken. Wish my gecko would try them, but he only eats live worms apparently.
customer_reviews.author: Mmmissme

customer_reviews.title: They're a big hit
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, my bearded dragon loves these. I put them with his salad and offer them as additional protein when he's going through his crickets and live meal worms too fast. Great price, shipped responsibly. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Bossy Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great food for our dragon.
customer_reviews.text: My son's Bearded Dra.gon loves these. This is a great price for the weight. I wanted to add that these mealworms are significantly larger than the ones that we were buying in the smaller bottles.
customer_reviews.author: mom of five

customer_reviews.title: Bearded Dragon Loves
customer_reviews.text: Bearded dragon loves these - great economical way to reduce the amount of live food (in our case, crickets) needed to feed him on a daily basis. Includes a lot of mealworms and rehydrates quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Reubli

customer_reviews.title: Of course he prefers live worms but these are probably his second favorite food.
customer_reviews.text: My bearded dragon absolutely loves these. Of course he prefers live worms but these are probably his second favorite food.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Kotten

customer_reviews.title: NOTE: Lizards only eat LIVE food!
customer_reviews.text: Or... I should say my lizard hates them. Won't touch the stuff... Leopard Geckos only eat live food. (Make sure your species will eat non-moving items).
customer_reviews.author: Jenny K.

customer_reviews.title: but they look yummy enough that she should like them.
customer_reviews.text: Hedge not caring for their taste...but they look yummy enough that she should like them.
customer_reviews.author: SandiAnn B.

customer_reviews.title: Best as a snack for your reptile
customer_reviews.text: Not for daily consumption in regular diet. Best as a snack for your reptile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Freeze them to last longer
customer_reviews.text: Red Footed tortoise loves these as a treat. She will come “running” for them. I keep them in the freeze to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: erica ralston

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great way cheaper than the pet shop and it's a great treat
customer_reviews.author: callie

customer_reviews.title: Nice size bag
customer_reviews.text: My beardie doesn't really eat these but my fish LOVE EM!
customer_reviews.author: christina

product_meta.title: Zilla Reptile Food Munchies Mealworm, 3.75-Ounce
product_meta.description: Zilla reptile munchies are a quick and easy way to provide reptiles and other animals with high-protein foods that they prefer to eat. Dehydrated mealworms are high in necessary fat and ideal for bearded dragons, leopard Geckos, chameleons, as well as large tropical fish and birds!.
feature_bullets: Nutritious, Dehydrated Ingredients That Can Be Fed With Other Diets Or As A Treat
Quick And Easy Way To Provide Reptiles With High Protein Foods That They Prefer
Ideal For Bearded Dragons, Leopard Geckos, Chameleons As Well As Large Tropical Fish And Birds

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
